item.title: Learning Hugo
item.description: Learning Hugo This is the second post. It has a Level 1 heading and some emphasized text. Quick tips Use Markdown for content Put images in static/images Create layouts under layouts/ Back to the Home.

item.title: Hello from CS
item.description: Hello CS Welcome to the first post. This post demonstrates a Level 1 heading and bold text. Below is a Level 2 heading. Why CS is fun Computer science lets you build tools, reason about problems, and create elegant solutions.
